title.rendered: Triumph Motorcycle Riders from 12 cities ride to support girl child education

content.rendered: This Independence Day, Truimph Motorcycles India riders from 12 cities rode the roads to support girl child education. The riders rode across 12 cities in India – Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Pune, Kochi, Chandigarh, Ahmedabad, Indore, and Jaipur. The support for the cause was called Ride for Freedom.
